attributes.action: Amend the e-petitions to allow votes against any petition listed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Only allowing votes in favour of a petition gives an unbalanced view of public opinion. Nearly 50% of voters were in favour of a Conservative government in the last election! However, most were not in favour.
Allow votes against!

rejection.details:
This has been address in our FAQs:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/faq
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
